Name: AccountDescriptiveName
Notes: The descriptive name of the Customer account.

Name: CampaignStatus
Enum Values:
UNKNOWN / unknown
ENABLED / enabled
PAUSED / paused
REMOVED / removed

Name: SharedSetType
Enum Values:
NEGATIVE_KEYWORDS / Negative keywords
NEGATIVE_PLACEMENTS / Negative placements
UNKNOWN / unknown

Name: Status
Enum Values:
ENABLED / Enabled
REMOVED / Removed
UNKNOWN / unknown
Notes: The status of the main object in this row. For example, in a Campaign Performance Report this will be the status of each row's Campaign. In an Ad Group Performance Report this will be the status of each row's AdGroup.
